body_html: I have spent the last week and maybe more dealing with such issue. So, help me to uderstand (and save a lot of time): can we state that currently there is no way of shuffling and batching using the official TF input pipeline utilities?
body_text: I have spent the last week and maybe more dealing with such issue. So, help me to uderstand (and save a lot of time): can we state that currently there is no way of shuffling and batching using the official TF input pipeline utilities?
body: I have spent the last week and maybe more dealing with such [issue](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/43367697/batching-and-shuffling-padded-tf-train-sequenceexample). So, help me to uderstand (and save a lot of time): can we state that currently there is _no way_ of shuffling and batching using the official TF input pipeline utilities?
